phrs.translation: 烤鸡；烧鸡；烤油鸡；片皮脆烧鸡

sentences.sentence: Whoever roasts and eats it will find plenty of fat upon it, it has lived so well!
sentences.translation: 无论谁烤了吃它，必见上面有肥油，它长得多好啊！

sentences.sentence: A few Turkey facts to ponder as dinner roasts on Thursday.
sentences.translation: 大家都在考虑将烤火鸡作为周四的晚餐。

sentences.sentence: Besides roasts, Greek cooking features creative casseroles.
sentences.translation: 希腊烹调除了烤制外，有特色的是焙盘菜。
